nodes.text: A human male bounty hunter operated as a member of the Bounty Hunters' Guild during the era of the New Republic. Around 9 ABY, the hunter was recruited by Greef Karga to steal a force-sensitive child from Mandalorian bounty hunter Din Djarin. The human hunter and a Nikto bounty hunter attempted to kill Djarin, but they were both betrayed and killed by Karga, who found himself unable to go through with the plan after a native reptavian attack the night prior.
